title: Vegetable pancakes
ingredients: ['2 cupfuls of leafy veg (spinach, kale, cabbage, etc.), chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 slice root ginger, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce, or to taste', '4 beaten eggs', '4 cooked pancakes, kept warm']
